alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Yakutat (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 5:23PM AKST until January 22 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SNOW CONTINUES ACROSS THE NORTHERN PANHANDLE... .Snowfall continues across the northern panhandle with some pockets of freezing rain along the transition zone between Kake and along the outer coast to Yakutat. Over the inner channels near Juneau, snow has started to become wetter but remaining cold enough to stay as snow. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow and freezing rain. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze to a tenth. * WHERE...City and Borough of Yakutat. * WHEN...Until 9 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A continued mix of rain and snow is possible beyond the advisory timeframe with light accumulations.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. People are urged to prepare their property before the onset of winter weather. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
